about.title: About Sudoku Duo
about.intro: Sudoku Duo is my first self-developed app.
about.features: I love brain teasers and wanted to create a Sudoku app that not only relaxes and challenges, but also connects: With the unique 2-player mode, Sudoku becomes a shared experience â€“ perfect for friends, couples or friendly competitions.
about.support: If you like the app, I would really appreciate your support. Your rating in the Play Store helps me to further develop Sudoku Duo and new projects.
about.closing: Thank you for being part of it.

share.message: Play Sudoku Duo with me! A great Sudoku app with a unique 2-player mode. Challenge me! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.playfusiongate.sudokuduo
